#summary This page describes how to update page content of the site
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/updatePagecontent.jpg

= Introduction =

The content on the site pages is simple plain text that can be edited directly using the browser by the Administrator.

= How to Update the page Content =

  * Browse to the site, logged in as Administrator.
  * Click on Site Actions -> Edit Page 
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/EditPage.jpg 
  * The text on the page becomes editable within the browser itself.
  * Update the text. 
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/UpdateContent.jpg
  * Click *Check In* Button within the Page Tab.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/CheckIn.jpg 
  * Enter Check In comments when prompted to.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/CheckInComments.jpg
  * You will be able to see the page with updated content.
